snippet.title: Tropico 6 | Tropican Shores DLC | Release Trailer (US)
snippet.description:
Tropico 6 – Tropican Shores is now available:
Kalypso Store: https://www.kalypsomedia.com/tropico-6-tropican-shores
Steam Store: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2938080/Tropico_6__Tropican_Shores/
Epic Games Store: https://store.epicgames.com/p/tropico-6--tropican-shores
Microsoft Store: https://www.xbox.com/games/store/tropico-6-tropican-shores/9nbtbzj062j9
PlayStation Store: https://store.playstation.com/product/UP2060-PPSA05683_00-00TROPICANSHORES

Tropico 6 – Tropican Shores brings you a multitude of new opportunities to build and expand your island upon the ocean. Turn water into wine… pardon: turn water into electricity with the new Tidal Power Station, collect shiny Pearls with the Pearl Diver, and provide your subjects a host of new (and totally non-shack-related) housing options (caution: those houseboats might attract long-haired musician families.) Speaking of musicians – it wouldn’t be your favorite banana republic if there weren’t new ways for Tropicans and filthy rich tourists to spend their hard-earned money: the private Yacht Shipyard has you covered, but you’d better make sure there are no icebergs in sight!
With all the excitement of this news, you may find yourself in need of something relaxing to distract you from your ocean preparations. Luckily, El Prez has you covered with the restorative Dolphin Therapy – but be careful to vote for him or those dolphins might turn into sharks!

About Tropico 6: In Tropico 6 you begin your journey in the colonial era, sent by the crown to tame and bring civilization to the wild lands of Tropico. Improve your standing towards the revolutionaries and use them as a stepping stone towards gaining ultimate control over your tropical state. Once you are free from the iron grip of your royal oppressors, you can enjoy the freedoms of rule that only a true dictator can experience!

Tropico 6 is available for
PC: https://www.kalypsomedia.com/us/games/tropico-6/
Xbox One: https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/p/tropico-6/9n2vdjvmfkq9
PlayStation 4: https://store.playstation.com/en-us/product/UP2060-CUSA08217_00-T6POSTPREZBUNDLE/
Nintendo Switch: https://www.nintendo.com/games/detail/tropico-6-nintendo-switch-edition-switch/

***
Specializing in the development of strategy and simulation games for a global audience on multi platforms, Kalypso Media Group's IP portfolio includes full rights to the Tropico series, Commandos, Port Royale, Dungeons, Sudden Strike and Railway Empire, among others. Kalypso Media's most recent releases are Matchpoint – Tennis Championships, Commandos 3 – HD Remaster, Tortuga - A Pirate's Tale, and Railway Empire 2, Dungeons 4 and The Inquisitor.

***
Subscribe to our newsletter and receive a 20% discount off your next Kalypso store purchase: https://www.kalypsomedia.com/us/newsletter

***
Want to see more? Stay in touch on our other channels:
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/WorldofTropico
X: https://twitter.com/El_Prez
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/kalypso_media/   
Website: https://www.kalypsomedia.com

#Tropico6 #TropicanShores  #DLC
